titles: The popish kingdome, or reigne of Antichrist, written in Latine verse by Thomas Naogeorgus, and englyshed by Barnabe Googe
author: Naogeorg, Thomas, 1511-1563.
Googe, Barnabe, 1540-1594.
Naogeorg, Thomas, 1511-1563. Agriculturae sacrae libri quinque. Book 1-2. English. aut
publisher: By Henrie Denham, for Richarde VVatkins,
notes: Includes "The spirituall husbandry", a translation by Barnabe Googe of the first two books of: Agriculturae sacrae libri quinque.
